product_overview: BarberApp is a comprehensive web-based management system tailored for barbershops. It offers an integrated solution for appointment scheduling, client management, billing, subscription plans, and financial expense tracking, designed with a high-performance and user-friendly interface.
core_goals: Provide real-time financial insights with daily, monthly, and annual revenue KPIs.
Enable efficient scheduling and management of client appointments with easy editing and filtering.
Maintain a complete client database with detailed service histories and subscription plan management including automatic renewal logic.
Offer robust financial control capabilities, including expense tracking and credit card management.
Ensure data synchronization between the primary database (Supabase) and Google Sheets for redundancy and ease of access.
key_features: Navigation Sidebar for seamless access to Dashboard, Records, Clients, Plans, and Expenses pages.
Dashboard displaying key financial KPIs in real time, including daily, monthly, and annual revenues.
Records page with a tabular CRUD interface for managing appointments, featuring inline editing and autocomplete for clients and procedures.
Clients page with a searchable list of clients and their service histories.
Plans management interface to handle client subscription plans with cycle control and payment history tracking.
Financial management module for recording expenses and managing credit card information with payment status tracking.
Theme configuration allowing accent color customization for enhanced UI personalization.
user_flow_summary: User logs into the system and navigates through the sidebar to access Dashboard, Records, Clients, Plans, or Expenses.
User views real-time KPIs on the Dashboard for business performance insights.
User creates, edits, or deletes appointment records on the Records page, utilizing autocomplete and inline editing features.
User searches, views, and manages client profiles and their subscription plans on the Clients and Plans pages.
User records financial expenses, manages credit card details, and tracks payment statuses via the Financial module.
User customizes the application appearance through theme configuration settings.
validation_criteria: All CRUD operations for appointments, clients, plans, and expenses must persist correctly in Supabase and reflect instantly in the UI.
Financial KPIs must correctly aggregate revenue from appointment payments and subscription plans.
Autocomplete features for clients and procedures must provide relevant suggestions and support quick selection.
Date validation logic should prevent booking of appointments on invalid or conflicting dates.
Data synchronization engine must correctly update the global state from Google Sheets and maintain data consistency.
Payment methods should auto-suggest based on active client subscription plans during appointment creation.
The UI should maintain high performance and responsiveness across supported browsers and devices.
